MemberSignature.Value: public void Invoke (object pvInstance, int memid, short wFlags, ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.DISPPARAMS pDispParams, out object pVarResult, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.EXCEPINFO pExcepInfo, out int puArgErr);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Invoke(object pvInstance, int32 memid, int16 wFlags, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DISPPARAMS& pDispParams, [out] object& pVarResult, [out] valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.EXCEPINFO& pExcepInfo, [out] int32& puArgErr) cil managed
Public Sub Invoke (pvInstance As Object, memid As Integer, wFlags As Short, ByRef pDispParams As DISPPARAMS, ByRef pVarResult As Object, ByRef pExcepInfo As EXCEPINFO, ByRef puArgErr As Integer)

public: void Invoke(System::Object ^ pvInstance, int memid, short wFlags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::DISPPARAMS % pDispParams, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % pVarResult, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::EXCEPINFO % pExcepInfo, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % puArgErr);

param.name: pvInstance
param.span: Reference to the interface described by this type description.

span.span: Reference to the interface described by this type description.

param.name: memid
param.span: Identifies the interface member.

span.span: Identifies the interface member.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: Flags describing the context of the invoke call.

span.span: Flags describing the context of the invoke call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: Reference to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.

span.span: Reference to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: Reference to the location at which the result is to be stored.

span.span: Reference to the location at which the result is to be stored.

param.span: If wFlags specifies or , pVarResult is ignored.

span.span: If wFlags specifies or , pVarResult is ignored.

param.span: Set to if no result is desired.

span.span: Set to if no result is desired.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: Points to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if is returned.

span.span: Points to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if is returned.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: If returns , puArgErr indicates the index within rgvarg of the argument with incorrect type.

span.span: If returns , puArgErr indicates the index within rgvarg of the argument with incorrect type.

param.span: If more than one argument returns an error, puArgErr indicates only the first argument with an error.

span.span: If more than one argument returns an error, puArgErr indicates only the first argument with an error.

summary.span: Invokes a method, or accesses a property of an object, that implements the interface described by the type description.

span.span: Invokes a method, or accesses a property of an object, that implements the interface described by the type description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 値`pDispParams`経由でアクセスできるです。The values of `pDispParams` can be accessed through . 有効な値`wFlags`は。Valid values for `wFlags` are: |[値]Value|説明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |DISPATCH_METHODDISPATCH_METHOD|メンバーは、メソッドとしてアクセスします。The member is accessed as a method. あいまいさにより、この両方がある場合、`DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET`フラグを設定することができます。If there is ambiguity, both this and the `DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET` flag can be set.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYGETDISPATCH_PROPERTYGET|メンバーは、プロパティまたはデータ メンバーとして取得されます。The member is retrieved as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTDISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT|プロパティまたはデータ メンバーとして、メンバーが変更されます。The member is changed as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREFDISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF|メンバーを変更するには、値の代入ではなく、参照の割り当てを使用します。The member is changed by using a reference assignment, rather than a value assignment. この値は、プロパティがオブジェクトへの参照を受け入れる場合にのみ有効です。This value is only valid when the property accepts a reference to an object.| 詳細については`ITypeInfo::Invoke`、MSDN ライブラリを参照してください。For additional information about `ITypeInfo::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
